She was telling her two best friends about it, and explained that she had to make Ernesto promise not to tell anyone about their affair.

The two best friends then came up with a plan to break up this happy relationship.  They would convince Ernesto that he’d never be happy with just one woman, and that he needed to have many women, including one of the best friends.  They explained that the woman he was with now would just be a great partner in crime, but that they had many more amazing qualities as well.
